Method: inject(WebServiceContext webServiceContext)
Description: JAX-WS runtimes calls this method to ask container to inject WebServiceContext on the endpoint instance.

Method: invoke(Method m, Object... args)
Description: JAX-WS runtime calls this method to do the actual web service invocation on endpoint instance.

Method: createAndPublishEndpoint(String address, Object implementor)
Description: Creates and publishes an endpoint object with the specified address and implementation object.

Method: createAndPublishEndpoint(String address, Object implementor, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates and publishes an endpoint object with the specified address, implementation object and web service features.

Method: createEndpoint(String bindingId, Class<?> implementorClass, Invoker invoker, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates an endpoint object with the provided binding, implementation class, invoker and web service features.

Method: createEndpoint(String bindingId, Object implementor)
Description: Creates an endpoint object with the provided binding and implementation object.

Method: createEndpoint(String bindingId, Object implementor, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates an endpoint object with the provided binding, implementation object and web service features.

Method: createServiceDelegate(URL wsdlDocumentLocation, QName serviceName, Class<? extends Service> serviceClass)
Description: Creates a service delegate object.

Method: createServiceDelegate(URL wsdlDocumentLocation, QName serviceName, Class<? extends Service> serviceClass, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates a service delegate object.

Method: createW3CEndpointReference(String address, QName serviceName, QName portName, List<Element> metadata, String wsdlDocumentLocation, List<Element> referenceParameters)
Description: Factory method to create a W3CEndpointReference.

Method: createW3CEndpointReference(String address, QName interfaceName, QName serviceName, QName portName, List<Element> metadata, String wsdlDocumentLocation, List<Element> referenceParameters, List<Element> elements, Map<QName,String> attributes)
Description: Factory method to create a W3CEndpointReference.

Method: getPort(EndpointReference endpointReference, Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: provider()
Description: Creates a new provider object.

Method: readEndpointReference(Source eprInfoset)
Description: read an EndpointReference from the infoset contained in eprInfoset.

Method: addPort(QName portName, String bindingId, String endpointAddress)
Description: Creates a new port for the service.

Method: createDispatch(EndpointReference endpointReference, Class<T> type, Service.Mode mode, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with objects of the user's choosing.

Method: createDispatch(EndpointReference endpointReference, JAXBContext context, Service.Mode mode, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with JAXB generated objects.

Method: createDispatch(QName portName, Class<T> type, Service.Mode mode)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with objects of the user's choosing.

Method: createDispatch(QName portName, Class<T> type, Service.Mode mode, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with objects of the user's choosing.

Method: createDispatch(QName portName, JAXBContext context, Service.Mode mode)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with JAXB generated objects.

Method: createDispatch(QName portName, JAXBContext context, Service.Mode mode, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: Creates a Dispatch instance for use with JAXB generated objects.

Method: getExecutor()
Description: Returns the executor for this Serviceinstance.

Method: getHandlerResolver()
Description: Returns the configured handler resolver.

Method: getPort(Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: getPort(Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: getPort(EndpointReference endpointReference, Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: getPort(QName portName, Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: getPort(QName portName, Class<T> serviceEndpointInterface, WebServiceFeature... features)
Description: The getPort method returns a proxy.

Method: getPorts()
Description: Returns an Iterator for the list of QNames of service endpoints grouped by this service

Method: getServiceName()
Description: Gets the name of this service.

Method: getWSDLDocumentLocation()
Description: Gets the location of the WSDL document for this Service.

Method: setExecutor(Executor executor)
Description: Sets the executor for this Service instance.

Method: setHandlerResolver(HandlerResolver handlerResolver)
Description: Sets the HandlerResolver for this Service instance.
